posts.post_content:
Posted By: scott levy
All,

Time to sell the 'doubles'.  This worked so well last time that I figured I'll give Net 54 a shot before listing on ebay.

T206
The Becketts:
BVG 1 Chance Red Portrait (Sovereign back) - $60
BVG 2 Bill Hart (looks EX but tiny spot of paper loss on back) - $95
BVG 4.5 Knight Batting $60
BVG 4.5 Egan (Sovereign) $65
BVG 5 Phillippe $90
BVG 5.5 Chase Black Cap $200
BVG 6 Collins Minneapolis $325

PSA/SGC Graded Cards:
T206 Joe Dunn Brooklyn - PSA 4 - $50
T206 James Westlake - PSA 5 - $395
T206 Witse Pitching - PSA 5 - $110
T206 Neal Ball - PSA 5 - $95
T206 Jean Dubuc - PSA 5 - $95
T206 Huggins Hands at Mouth - SGC 50 - $175
T206 Zimmermann (looks EX/MT to me)- SGC 50 - $65
T206 Donlin w/ bat - SGC 60 - $95
T206 Rhoades Hands at Chest - SGC 60 - $110
T206 Raymond - SGC 70 - $125
T205 Downey - PSA 4 - $55
T205 Austin - Cycle back - PSA 4 - $70

Rare Backs (I haven't priced them yet send me an email in the meantime)
T206 H. Davis P42 Poor
T206 Jennings P42 - PSA 4
T206 Pelty Vertical - AB460 - looks EX but tiny paper loss SGC 30
T206 Sheckard - AB460 - SGC 40
T206 Willis Cycle 460 PSA 4 - 
T206 Hannifan - Carolina Brights - SGC 50
T206 Many blank backs (sorry for all those who I owe scans!)
T207 blank backs (several)

Beckett says these are trimmed and for the most part I agree
Beckley (looks EX+ but somewhat short) - $70
Chance Red Portrait (looks EX, very slightly short) - $95
M. Brown Portrait (looks EX, somewhat short) - $125
Mathewson Dark Cap (looks NR/MT, very slightly short) - $250
Bender Trees (looks EX/MT, appears full size) - $150
Bender No Trees (looks EX+ but is slightly short and slantcut) - $70

Other Raw Cards
Jones (Detroit) - VG/EX - $30
Jones Throwing (St. Louis) - VG/EX - $30
Mitchell - VG/EX - $30
Seymour Throwing EX but has wavy edge (trimmed or factory cut?) - $35



Thanks,
Scott

First Email to say "I'll take it" gets the card(s)
Orders under $100 please add $5 for shipping all other shipping is free
